thread.section_title: LAVASOFT Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LAVASOFT | www.lavasoft.com
thread.title: Elizabeth

author: Elizabeth
title: Elizabeth
text:
I just got a promotional link to upgrade to Antivirus Pro. I proceeded to purchase it. However, I later noticed that I am being charged for a physical CD shipped to my address.I wanted to contact Customer Service at Lavasoft to not ship the CD and take off the charges.
They claim to offer 24/7 service. (I had to google their link, as it is not even listed on their web site!)
All I got was hang-ups after I selected Customer Service or they offered a call-back, if I am a corporate client.
I decided to reverse the charges and will not download the Antivirus Pro. I cannot trust a company with NO support.
Something does not add up.
